edu.OOSE.cs.jhu.group2.PopZombiesUI

Class Screen

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.OOSE.cs.jhu.group2.PopZombiesUI.Screen

  • public abstract class Screen
extends java.lang.Object
    Interface for the screen user interacts with on mobile device.
    Author:
    Connie Chang, Stephanie Chew, Kevin Zhang, Elaine Chao, Ted Stanley

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Screen(Game game)
      Constructor for screen.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void backButton()
      Previous screen when the user wants to exit game and go back to main menu.
      abstract void dispose()
      Deletes the file object of the screen.
      abstract void paint(float deltaTime)
      Paint the graphics to show user play-by-play of player's actions and game's response to actions.
      abstract void pause()
      Pauses the game and stops any timers or counters from continuing.
      abstract void resume()
      Picks the game back off where it left off previously and screen goes back to rendering new views.
      abstract void update(float deltaTime)
      Updates the screen to render a new view.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Screen

        public Screen(Game game)
        Constructor for screen.
        Parameters:
        game - the current game that the user is running

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public abstract void update(float deltaTime)
        Updates the screen to render a new view.
        Parameters:
        deltaTime - time passed in between before next update

      • paint

        public abstract void paint(float deltaTime)
        Paint the graphics to show user play-by-play of player's actions and game's response to actions.
        Parameters:
        deltaTime - time elapsed before screen should paint new view

      • pause

        public abstract void pause()
        Pauses the game and stops any timers or counters from continuing. Player cannot hit any zombies and no zombies can attack player. No new view is rendered.

      • resume

        public abstract void resume()
        Picks the game back off where it left off previously and screen goes back to rendering new views.

      • dispose

        public abstract void dispose()
        Deletes the file object of the screen.

      • backButton

        public abstract void backButton()
        Previous screen when the user wants to exit game and go back to main menu.
